Your browser does not support HTML5 Your browser does not support HTML5

Keybinds

  • 1-7: Render Scenes 1-7
  • W: Move Camera Forward
  • A: Move Camera Left
  • S: Move Camera Backwards
  • D: Move Camera Right
  • R: Reset Scene
  • Left Arrow: Roll Camera Left
  • Right Arrow: Roll Camera Right
  • Up Arrow: Move Camera Up
  • Down Arrow: Move Camera Down
  • C: Toggle FPS Mode
  • K: Capture a Keyframe
  • P: Start/Pause Animation Playback
  • H: Record Animation and Download as WEBM
  • L: Lock/Unlock Selected Keyframe Timestamp
  • U: Update Selected Keyframe to Current Position
  • Delete: Delete Selected Keyframe
  • =: Preview Selected Keyframe in Viewer
  • T: Hold while Dragging Bone to Translate
